ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T23:01:57 [Issue ID 4000-110561] urn:comicvine:4000-110561 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-19 19:59:28. [Issue ID 407768]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Capcom's legendary action-horror franchise, Darkstalkers, continues its pulse-pounding epic tale as Donovan, the mysterious demon-hunting warrior-monk, arrives on the scene, driven by a shadowy past to fulfill a single purpose: destroy the Dark Ones who dare walk the Earth. His quest has taken him around the world and shown a great many horrible things, but none as great as the one he witnesses the young girl, Anita, endure. But even as he takes her under his wing, he senses a dark secret behind her cold, frozen eyes, and wonders if there will be any salvation for her soul. Meanwhile, Morrigan's mortal enemy, Demitri Maximov, may not be as dead as she once believed... PLUS! The master of action-packing, LeSean Thomas(Cannon Busters, TMNT), provides a blazing backup tale of horror! Donovan meets Anita; Morrigan hears from a questionably reliable source that her mortal enemy Demitri may still live.
LeSean Thomas provides the art for a back-up story.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/darkstalkers-2-chapter-02/4000-110561/
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 02
